title: WEDNESDAY 3/31 - EXPANDED REGULAR SEASON
itunes:title: WEDNESDAY 3/31 - EXPANDED REGULAR SEASON
description:
The NFL announcing, starting in 2021, the regular season will expand to 17 games (0:09) which also will provide some exciting matchups to end the season. Commissioner Roger Goodell (1:17) also announcing he expects to see full stadiums in the upcoming season. Saints QB Jameis Winston says he's ok with a word most quarterbacks fear (1:30). Plus, Justin Fields and Mac Jones put on a show at their respective pro days

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
